description: This file defines functions to manage a shopping list using an Agent class, including adding, removing, and listing items. It also creates an instance of the Agent with specific tools and instructions, and demonstrates usage with print responses and session state outputs.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an AI agent that manages state and tools.

methods.name: add_item
methods.description: Adds an item to the shopping list if not already present.

methods.name: remove_item
methods.description: Removes an item from the shopping list by name.

methods.name: list_items
methods.description: Lists all items currently in the shopping list.
